title: Banned for dying too much
body:
riot just because I died more than 10 times in a game does not mean im trolling =.=
there goes my account I guess thanks a lot

replies.body:
You had only *900* damage to champions over 25 minutes.

You had one ward in 25 minutes.

You went 1/12/2 in a lane you *countered hard*.

You had less CS than your support, and only 8 more than *their* support.

You died several times in almost the exact same spot.

You died a bit before before 2 minutes in, and then again before the third minute, and proceeded to die every couple minutes from that point onward.

You went afk after your last death, which I can tell based on your gold income being *completely* flat. Seems Olaf might have as well, although that may well have been sheer frustration.

The only item you actually completed was {{item:3009}}.

Every last item you had gave you MS in some way. {{item:3096}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3113}} {{item:2053}}. {{item:3070}} is because your W gives MS. Kayle gets zero of these items in any even semi-meta build. The MS was bought only to get to lane faster to *die faster*.

You didn't even put a single point in E.

Yeah. You inted. All of these things together are too suspicious.

When you have 12 deaths, a completely haphazard build, a support item despite apparently being mid-lane, and less than 1000 damage dealt to champions, it does look *very* suspicious. Especially when your match history includes a 0/20/1 Garen game where you only have Ancient Coin and Aether Wisp, and what looks like 10 deaths in your own jungle to camps.
It's funny how all your deaths were in near enough the exact same location.

You know I had a scenario like this happen to me once. The whole team getting steamrolled (sept jungle who is fighting the good fight) and I ended up being punished. But I gathered information around the game and sent a ticket to Riot support and they overturned the ban! Have you contacted Riot Support yet? 

For reference: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ZkZWEUYE-banned-for-intentionally-feeding-but-it-was-just-a-hard-game
Try to make it less obvious next time.

You were just banned for a game that happened nearly a month ago?

I'd watch the replay, but it's expired.

Looks like you AFKed, honestly.

[REMOVED UNNECESSARY INSULT - PRANDINE]
